name: Grenade Launcher
description: A grenade launcher with a drum mag, its shells explode and cause splash damage on contact with enemies or hard surfaces.

name: Pump Shotgun
description: A slow firing shotgun.  Must be pumped after firing every shot.
notes: The pump shotgun must be pumped after each shot, which can be done on half beats, leaving an effective fire rate of every full beat.

name: Gattling Gun
description: A fully automatic minigun that revs up the longer you hold fire.
notes: The Gattling Gun fires 2 shots over the first full beat, 4 shots per beat for 2 beats, and finally 8 shots per beat until you run out of ammo or let go.

name: Automatic Shotgun
description: An automatic shotgun.  Must be pumped after firing every shot.

name: Laser Pistol
description: this gun requires 1 beat to charge before attacking.

name: Grenade Launcher
description: A grenade launcher with a drum mag, its shells explode and cause splash damage on contact with enemies or hard surfaces.
